alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kane (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 2:49PM MDT until August 02 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Garfield County in southern Utah... Northeastern Kane County in southern Utah... * Until 330 PM MDT * At 248 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 26 miles southeast of Escalante, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Capitol Reef National Park and Glen Canyon National Recreation Area. This includes Utah Route 276 between mile markers 16 and 32. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
